summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6189 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Ross Second Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by Argand Street, 8th Avenue West, Emerson Street, 6th Avenue West and West Bertona Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87478, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
